description: Los Angeles Times: "...this no-pressure, when-you're-ready, everybody-does-it, demystifying approach is it." It's potty time at the Big Blue House as Bear's friends discover that going to the bathroom by yourself is part of the adventure of growing up! Featuring these songs: "Welcome Song" "Potty Chair" "Toileteers" "Goodbye Song" Color, not rated, approximate running time 25 minutes.
